battle_traits.name: Smash It All To Bits
battle_traits.activation: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Shooting Phase
battle_traits.declare: Pick a friendly Mega-Gargant that has not used a Rampage ability this turn to use this ability, then pick a terrain feature within its combat range. Then, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of that Mega-Gargant to be the target.
battle_traits.effect: Roll a D3 for each friendly and enemy unit on the terrain feature that was picked. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that unit equal to the roll. After rolling for all those units, roll a dice. On a 3+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

battle_traits.name: Wrath of Brodd
battle_traits.activation: Once Per Battle (Army), Your Charge Phase
battle_traits.declare: Pick a friendly Mega‑Gargant that has not used a Rampage ability this turn to use this ability.
battle_traits.effect: If the unit using this ability charged this turn, roll a dice. On a 3+, that unit can move 3D6" but must end that move in combat.

battle_traits.name: Double Stomp
battle_traits.activation: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
battle_traits.declare: Pick a friendly Mega‑Gargant that has not used a Rampage ability this turn to use this ability.
battle_traits.effect: Roll a D6. On a 3+, for the rest of the turn, add the result to the Attacks characteristic of the Almighty Stomp or Almightier Stomp of the unit using this ability.

battle_traits.name: Watch This!
battle_traits.activation: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
battle_traits.declare: Pick a friendly Mega‑Gargant that has not used a Rampage ability this turn to use this ability, then pick an enemy unit in combat with it to be the target.
battle_traits.effect:
If the target is a Hero, Beast, Monster or War Machine, roll 6 dice. Otherwise, roll a dice for each model in the target unit. For each roll that is equal to or greater than the target’s Save characteristic, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

The Mega‑Gargant using this Rampage has Strike‑last for the rest of the turn.

battle_traits.name: Crafty Creepers
battle_traits.activation: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
battle_traits.declare: Pick a friendly Mega‑Gargant that has not used a Rampage ability this turn to use this ability. Then, pick an enemy Hero that has an artefact of power and is in combat with that Mega‑Gargant to be the target.
battle_traits.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, the target no longer has that artefact of power.

battle_traits.name: Timberrrrr!
battle_traits.effect: Each time a friendly Mega‐Gargant or Gargant model is slain, before removing it from play, the players must roll off. The winner picks a point on the battlefield within 3" of that model. Inflict D3 mortal damage on each unit (friendly and enemy) within 3" of that point that has a lower Health characteristic than that model.

battle_traits.name: The World Titan's Prophet
battle_traits.effect:
While any other friendly Brodd’s Stomp units are within a friendly King Brodd’s combat range:

• That friendly King Brodd has Ward (5+).
• Each time you make a successful ward roll for that friendly King Brodd, allocate 1 damage point to another friendly Brodd’s Stomp unit within its combat range after the damage sequence for that friendly King Brodd has been resolved (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points).

heroic_traits.name: I Can Do That Better
heroic_traits.activation: Once Per Battle (Army), Reaction: You declared the ‘Wrath of Brodd’ ability for a friendly unit
heroic_traits.effect: This unit can use the ‘Wrath of Brodd’ ability immediately after the ‘Wrath of Brodd’ ability used by the other friendly unit has been resolved. This unit can do so even if it has used another Rampage ability this turn.

artefacts_of_power.name: Lucky Shiny Hat
artefacts_of_power.effect: This unit has Ward (4+) against damage points inflicted by Spell and Prayer abilities and by abilities used by Manifestations.

King Brodd's Stomp Prayer Lore.name: High Expectations
King Brodd's Stomp Prayer Lore.declare: Pick a friendly Brodd’s Stomp Priest to chant this prayer, then make a chanting roll of D6.
King Brodd's Stomp Prayer Lore.effect: Until the start of your next turn, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly Brodd’s Stomp units while they are wholly within 12" of the chanter. If the chanting roll was 9+, add 2 to the Attacks characteristic instead.
